title: Rainy night city driving with moderate speed and braking events.
caption: The ego vehicle is driving on a rainy night in a city street with moderate speed and braking events.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is rainy (hardRainNight). The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed (average speed â‰ˆ 8.4 m/s). There are 2 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed to maintain safety in the rainy conditions. It slows down and brakes when necessary to avoid collisions with other vehicles or pedestrians. The driver must be cautious and attentive to the surroundings to ensure safe driving in such weather conditions.
